alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 10:24PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Accomack and northern Northampton Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1023 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over Exmore, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Exmore, Onancock, Parksley, Onley, Nassawadox, Willis Wharf, Accomac, Melfa, Bloxom, Wachapreague, Painter, Hallwood, Keller, Harborton, Mappsville, Franktown, Wallops Island, Nelsonia, Modest Town and Clam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
